nodes.text: The Otoga-222 maintenance droid was a model of repair droid used to repair podracers. Podracer pilot Ben Quadinaros owned an Otoga-222 droid and made use of it during the Boonta Eve Classic of 32 BBY. An Otoga-222 was also for sale in Watto's junkshop in Mos Espa in 22 BBY.
The Otoga-222 maintenance droid first appeared without identification in the 1999 film Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace.
